name: EternalLive
description:
This is a Third person and First-person Shooting game for shooting monsters and the final boss with pistol. The player can control the character to move, jump, aim and shoot while experiencing the whole story and beat the monsters.

In this game, player will play as Jimmy, a bounty hunter who experienced the World War 2. Now he finally finds his enemy Dr. K in a village called “Eternal Live”

Eternal live village is famous for the longevity of its’ inhabitants which also attracted Dr. K’s attention.

So just find him and smash his evil plan!
